description:
Ushio attacks Shide with all her might. However, she learns that his real body resides in the present world. The only way for her to win is to destroy his armor. Ushio is rendered powerless after a deadly battle against Shide, and she is on the brink of defeat. Shinpei takes over the fight. Ushio`s hacking ability takes two minutes to recover. The curtain rises on the last battle.
Source: Disney+
